entries.title: 2025-08-24 - Matthew 2
entries.excerpt: Magi seek Christ, Herod kills infants, family flees to Egypt.

entries.title: 2025-08-25 - Matthew 3
entries.excerpt: Jesus was baptised by John the Baptist.

entries.title: 2025-08-27 - Matthew 4
entries.excerpt: Jesus was tested in the wilderness and then began His ministry on earth.

entries.title: 2025-08-29 - Matthew 5
entries.excerpt: Jesus delivered the Sermon on the Mount.

entries.title: 2025-09-07 - Matthew 6
entries.excerpt: Jesus gave practical teachings on giving, praying, fasting, storing treasures, and dealing with worry.
